name: Heavenly Bodies (Nothing Exploded)
description:
What stories do the heavens tell?

Discover new constellations, write their histories and record them in the book of Heavenly Bodies. 

  • Link stars to create a constellation based on the games’ prompt 
  • Piece together its history 
  • Draw an image to overlay your constellation
  • Post it to the book of Heavenly Bodies (@BookofHB)

Find us on Twitter: 

@AdoneKitching / @BsMcInnes
